title: Whiterun Victory â€” Galmar Down, Hadvar Stabilized, Foothold Secured
summary: Insaerndel assassinated Galmar Stone-Fist during the Battle of Whiterun, breaking Stormcloak command.
Stormcloak line collapsed/retreated; Whiterun held for the Empire.
Hadvar was stabilized by Restoration and entrusted with the alias 'Orinthelo' (Penitus Oculatus asset).
Thalmor handler already eliminated; Whiterun Thalmor node neutralized; false trails planted.
Battle-Born contract paid; Whiterun Thieves Guild foothold completed.
